RedirectionNotice.answer: Your account doesn't belong to the NAGA entity you are trying to login to. Please continue and we will direct you to the appropriate one.

incorrectPassword_1try.answer: Unfortunately, the password you entered is not correct. Please try again. You have 4 more attemtps left.

incorrectPassword_2try.answer: The password you entered is not correct. Please try again or reset your password if you forgot it. You have 2 more attempts left.

AccountBlockDescription.answer: Incorrect password. You have 1 more attempt left. Afterwards, you will be unable to log in for 2 hours. You may reset your password in case you forgot it.

AccountBlockDescriptionLastTry.answer: Incorrect password. You have exceeded the number of login attempts, your account is blocked for 2 hours.

ForgotPasswordDescription.answer: Enter the email address associated with your account, and we will email you a link to reset your password
